mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_gender, user_email, user_birth, user_phone, user_address, user_sms_check, user_num) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, #{user_email}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_sms_check}, seq_user_num.nextval)
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select * from tbl_user where user_name = #{user_name} and user_email = #{user_email}
